svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - December 21 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
December 21, 2024" date: "2024-12-21"
Eth News and Links
Eth R&D protocol call (All Core Devs)
• Execution layer focused protocol call (ACDE #202): Pectra upgrade: Pectra-devnet-5 spec : Launch
when enough clients are ready, testing locally with Teku & Besu EIP7840 blob schedule in EL config:
added to devnet EIP7702 : chain id changed to u256 EIP2537 BLS precompile: gas repricing finalized &
redundant MUL precompiles removed System contracts: audited, recommended minor changes for EIP2935,
audits to be shared in January History expiry : discussed need for eth/70 protocol to drop pre-merge
data Gossip limit : discussed decoupling gas limit & payload size eth/69 : agreed to not remove new
block hashes as used by non-merged chains EIP7808 reserve tx-type range for RIPs : approved Resource
pricing : working group starting to coordinate repricing efforts Hardware specs : feedback wanted on
commodity node hardware
• Pectra upgrade: Pectra-devnet-5 spec : Launch when enough clients are ready, testing locally with
Teku & Besu EIP7840 blob schedule in EL config: added to devnet EIP7702 : chain id changed to u256
EIP2537 BLS precompile: gas repricing finalized & redundant MUL precompiles removed System contracts:
audited, recommended minor changes for EIP2935, audits to be shared in January
Pectra upgrade:
• Pectra-devnet-5 spec : Launch when enough clients are ready, testing locally with Teku & Besu
EIP7840 blob schedule in EL config: added to devnet EIP7702 : chain id changed to u256 EIP2537 BLS
precompile: gas repricing finalized & redundant MUL precompiles removed System contracts:
• Launch when enough clients are ready, testing locally with Teku & Besu
Launch when enough clients are ready, testing locally with Teku & Besu
• EIP7840 blob schedule in EL config: added to devnet
EIP7840 blob schedule in EL config: added to devnet
• EIP7702 : chain id changed to u256
EIP7702 : chain id changed to u256
• EIP2537 BLS precompile: gas repricing finalized & redundant MUL precompiles removed
EIP2537 BLS precompile: gas repricing finalized & redundant MUL precompiles removed
• System contracts:
System contracts:
• History expiry : discussed need for eth/70 protocol to drop pre-merge data
History expiry : discussed need for eth/70 protocol to drop pre-merge data
• Gossip limit : discussed decoupling gas limit & payload size
Gossip limit : discussed decoupling gas limit & payload size
• eth/69 : agreed to not remove new block hashes as used by non-merged chains
eth/69 : agreed to not remove new block hashes as used by non-merged chains
• EIP7808 reserve tx-type range for RIPs : approved
EIP7808 reserve tx-type range for RIPs : approved
• Resource pricing : working group starting to coordinate repricing efforts Hardware specs : feedback
wanted on commodity node hardware
Resource pricing : working group starting to coordinate repricing efforts
• Hardware specs : feedback wanted on commodity node hardware
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade
• Reminder: Mekong testnet live for testing (pectra-devnet-4 spec)
Reminder: Mekong testnet live for testing (pectra-devnet-4 spec)
• Client testing call #17 : tested increasing gas limit to 40M & didn’t hit 10MiB gossip limit
Client testing call #17 : tested increasing gas limit to 40M & didn’t hit 10MiB gossip limit
• Consensus layer specs v1.5.0-alpha.10
Consensus layer specs v1.5.0-alpha.10
Layer 1
• Gas limit increase: Gas limit signaling dashboard, 20% of validators signalling to increase Coinbase
validators signaling for an increase to 36M
Gas limit increase:
• Gas limit signaling dashboard, 20% of validators signalling to increase
Gas limit signaling dashboard, 20% of validators signalling to increase
• Coinbase validators signaling for an increase to 36M
Coinbase validators signaling for an increase to 36M
• Data Always: role of MEV-Boost relays in reorgs
Data Always: role of MEV-Boost relays in reorgs
• EIP7732 ePBS breakout #14 : rebasing to Pectra, targeting interop for end of January
EIP7732 ePBS breakout #14 : rebasing to Pectra, targeting interop for end of January
• Terence: inclusion list committee selection approaches compared
Terence: inclusion list committee selection approaches compared
Research
• Post-Quantum: Upgrade tasks for quantum resistance : bip32, transaction signing, sender address
recovery, precompiles & node discovery Upgrading to a post-quantum signature scheme such as Falcon via
account abstraction, network upgrade or a hybrid
Post-Quantum:
• Upgrade tasks for quantum resistance : bip32, transaction signing, sender address recovery,
precompiles & node discovery
Upgrade tasks for quantum resistance : bip32, transaction signing, sender address recovery,
• Upgrading to a post-quantum signature scheme such as Falcon via account abstraction, network upgrade
or a hybrid
Upgrading to a post-quantum signature scheme such as Falcon via account abstraction, network upgrade
• Attester-includer separation : includers (inclusion list creators) rewarded with inclusion fees and
have minimal hardware/capital requirements
Attester-includer separation : includers (inclusion list creators) rewarded with inclusion fees and
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
• 🚨 Lido at 28.4% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
🚨 Lido at 28.4% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
• Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~43% & Nethermind ~36% (estimate
based on 74% self reported data) Consensus layer: Prysm 34% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss
of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
• Execution layer: Geth ~43% & Nethermind ~36% (estimate based on 74% self reported data)
Execution layer: Geth ~43% & Nethermind ~36% (estimate based on 74% self reported data)
• Consensus layer: Prysm 34%
Consensus layer: Prysm 34%
• Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
• Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Client Releases
• Consensus layer: Lighthouse v6.0.1 : patch for minor issues in v6 Lodestar v1.24.0 : adds
engine_getBlobsV1 support to get blobs from execution layer and adds experimental keymanager endpoint
Prysm v5.2.0 : QUIC enabled by default, adds engine_getBlobsV1 support and fix for using MEV-Boost
with a gas limit increase Teku v24.12.1 : bug fixes
Consensus layer:
• Lighthouse v6.0.1 : patch for minor issues in v6
Lighthouse v6.0.1 : patch for minor issues in v6
• Lodestar v1.24.0 : adds engine_getBlobsV1 support to get blobs from execution layer and adds
experimental keymanager endpoint
Lodestar v1.24.0 : adds engine_getBlobsV1 support to get blobs from execution layer and adds
• Prysm v5.2.0 : QUIC enabled by default, adds engine_getBlobsV1 support and fix for using MEV-Boost
with a gas limit increase
• Teku v24.12.1 : bug fixes
Teku v24.12.1 : bug fixes
• Execution layer: Besu v24.12.2 : hotfix for users of account state overrides in eth_call Erigon
v3.0.0-alpha7 : faster eth_getTransactionReceipt and return PrunedError when reading unavailable
historical data
Execution layer:
• Besu v24.12.2 : hotfix for users of account state overrides in eth_call
Besu v24.12.2 : hotfix for users of account state overrides in eth_call
• Erigon v3.0.0-alpha7 : faster eth_getTransactionReceipt and return PrunedError when reading
unavailable historical data
Erigon v3.0.0-alpha7 : faster eth_getTransactionReceipt and return PrunedError when reading
For stakers
• Ethstaker-deposit-cli v1 : generate validator keys, voluntary exit and add a withdrawal address to
an existing validator
EIPs/Standards
• EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals): EIP7843 : SLOT precompile
EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals):
• EIP7843 : SLOT precompile
• ERCs (application layer): ERC7842 : State channel data types & interfaces ERC7844 : Consolidated
dynamic storage ERC7845 : Minimal orchestrator RPC ERC7846 : Wallet connection API ERC7847 : Social
media NFTs
ERCs (application layer):
• ERC7842 : State channel data types & interfaces
ERC7842 : State channel data types & interfaces
• ERC7844 : Consolidated dynamic storage
ERC7844 : Consolidated dynamic storage
• ERC7845 : Minimal orchestrator RPC
ERC7845 : Minimal orchestrator RPC
• ERC7846 : Wallet connection API
ERC7846 : Wallet connection API
• ERC7847 : Social media NFTs
ERC7847 : Social media NFTs
Stuff for developers
• Foundry: Forge-std v1.9.5 : adds get broadcast cheat codes, mock call overloads and count for expect
emit/revert
• Forge-std v1.9.5 : adds get broadcast cheat codes, mock call overloads and count for expect
Security
• GemPad (launch pad) ~$2M exploit on mainnet, Base & BSC via reentrancy
GemPad (launch pad) ~$2M exploit on mainnet, Base & BSC via reentrancy
• Security Alliance (SEAL): LastPass users who stored private keys or seed phrases prior to 2023,
funds might be at risk
Security Alliance (SEAL): LastPass users who stored private keys or seed phrases prior to 2023, funds
might be at risk
Job Listings
• Nethermind: Agentic Internship , Snr Engineer , Fullstack Lead & Fullstack Go
Nethermind: Agentic Internship , Snr Engineer , Fullstack Lead & Fullstack Go
• Vyper (Pythonic EVM language) seek a DevRel
Vyper (Pythonic EVM language) seek a DevRel
• Mimic: Tech Lead Engineer
Mimic: Tech Lead Engineer
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
• Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 4.7 to 113.8 gwei, 15.2 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24
gwei 6.3k ETH net issuance this week
Fees (via ultrasound.money ):
• Gas: 4.7 to 113.8 gwei, 15.2 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24 gwei
Gas: 4.7 to 113.8 gwei, 15.2 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24 gwei
• 6.3k ETH net issuance this week
6.3k ETH net issuance this week
• ETHUSD : $3,113 - $4,078, currently $3,458 all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $3,113 - $4,078, currently $3,458 all time high $4,878
• ETHBTC : currently 0.035 (Flippening at ~0.164)
ETHBTC : currently 0.035 (Flippening at ~0.164)
Ecosystem
• Deep funding (retroactive grants for open source dependencies): Models assign relative weights for
the value that each dependency provides, spot checked by a human jury $170k for 40k Ethereum
dependencies assigned by models, $40k for best models & $40k for open source models
Deep funding (retroactive grants for open source dependencies):
• Models assign relative weights for the value that each dependency provides, spot checked by a human
jury
Models assign relative weights for the value that each dependency provides, spot checked by a human
• $170k for 40k Ethereum dependencies assigned by models, $40k for best models & $40k for open source
models
$170k for 40k Ethereum dependencies assigned by models, $40k for best models & $40k for open source
• Etherscan adds account abstraction transactions support (ERC4337 user ops)
Etherscan adds account abstraction transactions support (ERC4337 user ops)
• r/ethfinance subreddit merging with r/ethereum
r/ethfinance subreddit merging with r/ethereum
Enterprise
• Kraken Ink live using OP Stack
Kraken Ink live using OP Stack
• Deutsche Bank building L2 using ZKsync tech
Deutsche Bank building L2 using ZKsync tech
Regulation/business/tokens
• SEC: CyberKongz received Wells notice (Gensler favorite) Prometheum sued Matt Blumberg for
defamation
• CyberKongz received Wells notice
CyberKongz received Wells notice
• (Gensler favorite) Prometheum sued Matt Blumberg for defamation
(Gensler favorite) Prometheum sued Matt Blumberg for defamation
General
• Polygon proposal to generate yield from bridged assets abandoned after backlash
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-december-21-2024

(new/changes in bold )
• Jan 20 – Ethereum protocol attackathon ends
Jan 20 – Ethereum protocol attackathon ends
